item.title: Extracting analytical one-loop amplitudes from numerical evaluations
Analytical amplitudes from numerical evaluations
item.description:
Analytical   amplitudes   from   numerical   evaluations arXiv:1904.04067
Giuseppe De Laurentis with Daniel Maitre
QCD@LHC 2019 IPPP - Durham University Only speaker can read these. Press S to view. Table  of  Contents 1. Motivation and introduction 2. Singularity structure 3. Ansatz and amplitude reconstruction 4. Some results (Yang-Mills in the Standard Model)
